snippet: “You know, I have a lot of skills, but predicting Donald Trump is not one of them.” — Senator Ted Cruz of Texas, asked on Sunday at a Koch brothers’ conference in California how he expects Donald Trump will fare in the first Republican...
abstract: “You know, I have a lot of skills, but predicting Donald Trump is not one of them.” — Senator Ted Cruz of Texas, asked on Sunday at a Koch brothers’ conference in California how he expects Donald Trump will fare in the first Republican primary debate on Thursday.

headline.main: Verbatim: Ted Cruz’s Crystal Ball Reveals No Insight on Donald Trump
